English: She is going to the beach tomorrow.
Spanish: Ella va a la playa mañana.

English: He will be celebrating his birthday in July.
Spanish: Él va a celebrar su cumpleaños en julio.

English: We are studying Spanish every Tuesday and Thursday.
Spanish: Estudiamos español todos los martes y jueves.

English: The art gallery is closed on Mondays.
Spanish: La galería de arte está cerrada los lunes.
